page.title: 08THURSTON FETE PART 2
page.content:
ONE FAMILY'S DAY:ON THE FLOAT
It was time to meet the Float,which looked very colourful.We climbed aboard and soon set off.We waved to the crowds and some of the children played tambourines and other instruments. Everyone came out to watch.The worst part was getting onto,and travelling across, the playingfield.It was like being in a small boat in high seas. The Floats were then judged;we were delighted to win 1st prize.The Press photographer took pictures which later appeared in the local papers. At 4 o'clock we returned home,with two complaining clowns who had to walk.
